title: Clothes Care Center, Carpet / Vinyl Flooring, Bathtub with shower
neighborhood: 370 E Harmon Ave, Las Vegas, NV
posting_body: ['Come home to convenient living at The Harmon at 370 Apartments in Las Vegas, NV.', 'Enjoy life with easy access to transportation, shopping, entertainment, and City Center.', 'Choose from two very efficient apartment floor plans, and ready for you to move in.', 'We have an amazing pool and fitness center.', 'The Harmon at 370 Apartments is right where you want to be, centrally located and in the center of everything Las Vegas.', 'Give us a call, schedule a tour online, or stop in today for your personal tour.', '-Electric Oven / Range', '-Non-Smoking', '-Bathtub with shower', '-Vertical Blind Window Coverings', '-Clothes Care Center', '-Professional Management', '-Carpet / Vinyl Flooring', '-Two Oversized Resort Style Swimming Pools', '-Refrigerator with Freezer', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
